casebody.data:
Teresa M. GAFFNEY & Sarah K. Sussman, Individually and as Trustee of the Sussman Family Trust, Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
Phillip BAUMANN, Administrator ad litem of the Estate of John J. Gaffney, Deceased, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D17-3849 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. October 23, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Denied.
